name: Treats2Win
description:
Evil scarecrows throwing tricks around! Dodge them, collect 10 treats and make the children happy! ^_^ Movement - WASD Dash - Left Shift Credits:

Arts - HeCblp

Models - Avocado

UI/projectiles - Peachomon

Code/Camera/Ux - RottenEagle

Music - eclipsedeluna
